item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 2, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Pointers Are Complicated II, or: We need better language specs (2020) (31 points | 3 comments)

6. Python 3, Pygame, and Debian Bookworm on the Miyoo A30 (95 points | 17 comments)

9. String of recent killings linked to Bay Area rationalist 'death cult' (353 points | 440 comments)

13. Visualizing all books of the world in ISBN-Space (345 points | 69 comments)

16. Archivists work to save disappearing data.gov datasets (408 points | 124 comments)

23. Ratzilla (103 points | 24 comments)

27. Newsstands, 2012-2019 (42 points | 3 comments)
28. In Zig, what's a writer? (128 points | 60 comments)
29. 3D scene reconstruction in adverse weather conditions via Gaussian splatting (43 points | 10 comments)
30. DOGE Staff Had Questions About the 'Resign' Email. Their HR Chief Dodged Them (42 points | 5 comments)
